title: LockettePro 为啥其他人都能打开...
author: 承峰解说
txt_content: 如题,我换好多个LockettePro 版本了,不行...

replies.author: starkiller2k
replies.txt_content: 请详细描述一下你的问题 比如配置文件什么的 我使用LockettePro 基本都正常

replies.author: 承峰解说
replies.txt_content:
starkiller2k 发表于 2020-4-21 21:27
请详细描述一下你的问题 比如配置文件什么的 我使用LockettePro 基本都正常
配置language-file-name: lang_zh.yml
enable-quick-protect: true
enable-uuid-support: false
block-interfere-placement: true
block-item-transfer-in: false
block-item-transfer-out: true
block-hopper-minecart: remove
cache-time-seconds: 0
private-signs:
- '[Private]'
- '[private]'
additional-signs:
- '[More Users]'
- '[more Users]'
everyone-signs:
- '[Everyone]'
- '[everyone]'
timer-signs:
- '[Timer:@]'
- '[timer:@]'
lockables:
- CHEST
- TRAPPED_CHEST
- FURNACE
- BURNING_FURNACE
- HOPPER
- BREWING_STAND
- DIAMOND_BLOCK
- WOODEN_DOOR
- SPRUCE_DOOR
- BIRCH_DOOR
- JUNGLE_DOOR
- ACACIA_DOOR
- DARK_OAK_DOOR
- IRON_DOOR_BLOCK
protection-exempt:
- nothing
lock-expire: false
lock-expire-days: 999.9
lock-default-create-time-unix: -1
lock-expire-string: '&3[Expired]'
复制代码

replies.txt_content: 看起来并没有什么问题 后台有没有刷报错 牌子上有没有显示你的名字表示锁了
